Description: This is definitely the last chance for this guitar. Price will not be dropped lower and it will not be re-listed. For sale is a 2010 Gibson Custom Shop Randy Rhoads 1974 Les Paul Custom VOS in a beautiful White with original case and COA. Limited to only 200 worldwide this guitar has been treated to Gibson Custom’s VOS process to present the look of a gently aged instrument. All in all, this is the closest any fan, player or collector can get to owning Rhoads’s own guitar… without owning Rhoads’s own guitar. This guitar is in excellent condition and in perfect working order. There are some light scratches, a few dings (see last photo) btw, this was the last one one of these available when I bought it., and that is it. It's a VOS. Overall, I would give it a solid 9 out of 10 condition. Everything on the guitar is original. There are no cracks, repairs, or issues. The neck is straight with no issues. The original frets are in excellent condition with very slight wear. The original case works great. SPECS: Neck Type: Slim "D" Rhoads Profile Finger Board: Ebony Pickups: Gibson Custom Super '74 This guitar is amazing!!! Don't miss out on this!!! Check out the video. https://youtu.be/CT7vT5ROkzI I will ship within the continental United States only. I will ship insured UPS ground only. I will accept Paypal only. Good luck bidding!!!
Title: 2010 Gibson Custom Shop Randy Rhoads 1974 Les Paul Custom VOS White RR057
